comm

Class PCDI_Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • comm.PCDI_Parser

  • public class PCDI_Parser
extends java.lang.Object
    PCDI_Parser

    this class is needed by the PCD_Interface class to convert data into bytes or vice-versa.

    • Method Detail

      • parseTxParameterInfo

        public static PCDI_Message parseTxParameterInfo(int valueNr,
                                                int deviceId)
        this method is used to parse a parameterinfo request into a message
        Parameters:
        valueNr - is the value number of the requested parameter
        deviceId - the deviceId of the communication-device
        Returns:
        a message that contains the data in bytes including checksum, header and so on

      • parseTxParameterRead

        public static PCDI_Message parseTxParameterRead(int valueNr,
                                                int deviceId)
        this method is used to parse a parameterread-request to a (bytewise) message
        Parameters:
        valueNr - the value number of the requested parameter
        deviceId - the deviceId of the communication-device
        Returns:
        a message that contains the data in bytes including checksum, header and so on

      • parseTxParameterWrite

        public static PCDI_Message parseTxParameterWrite(PCDI_Parameter<?> parameter,
                                                 int deviceId)
        this method is used to parse a parameter-Write request to a bytewise message
        Parameters:
        parameter - the parameter including the value to parse
        deviceId - the deviceId of the communication-device
        Returns:
        a message that contains the data in bytes including checksum, header and so on

      • parseTxStartOscilloscope

        public static PCDI_Message parseTxStartOscilloscope(PCDI_OSCILLOSCOPE_COMMAND osci_cmd,
                                                    int valNr1,
                                                    int valNr2,
                                                    int valNr3,
                                                    int valNr4,
                                                    int valNr5,
                                                    int valNr6,
                                                    int valNr7,
                                                    int oversampling,
                                                    int deviceId)
        this method is used to parse a StartOscilloscope-Request into a (bytewise) Message
        Parameters:
        osci_cmd - is the oscilloscope command to execute
        valNr1 - is the requested value number of channel number 1
        valNr2 - is the requested value number of channel number 2
        valNr3 - is the requested value number of channel number 3
        valNr4 - is the requested value number of channel number 4
        valNr5 - is the requested value number of channel number 5
        valNr6 - is the requested value number of channel number 6
        valNr7 - is the requested value number of channel number 7
        oversampling - is the oversampling factor the device should use for sampling
        deviceId - the deviceId of the communication-device
        Returns:
        a message that contains the data in bytes including checksum, header and so on

      • parseTxCommand

        public static PCDI_Message parseTxCommand(PCDI_COMMANDS cmd,
                                          int deviceId)
        this method is used to parse a Command-Request into a (bytewise) Message
        Parameters:
        cmd - the command to parse
        deviceId - the deviceId of the communication-device
        Returns:
        a message that contains the data in bytes including checksum, header and so on

        Returns:

      • toByteArray

        public static byte[] toByteArray(java.util.List<java.lang.Byte> data)
        this method is used to convert data from list to byte array. it is needed if the hardware interface wants a byte array instead of a list
        Parameters:
        data - is the data to be converted
        Returns:
        byte array
